trans-unit.source: Azure Mobile Engagement User Interface - Dashboard
trans-unit.target: Azure Mobile Engagement User Interface - Dashboard

trans-unit.source: Learn how to view and manage charts of data about your application using Azure Mobile Engagement
trans-unit.target: Learn how to view and manage charts of data about your application using Azure Mobile Engagement

trans-unit.source: How to view and manage charts of data about your application
trans-unit.target: How to view and manage charts of data about your application

trans-unit.source: The Dashboard section of the UI allows customers to create customized charts to maximize their time by providing the exact information they want instead of searching for it in the analytics section.
trans-unit.target: The Dashboard section of the UI allows customers to create customized charts to maximize their time by providing the exact information they want instead of searching for it in the analytics section.

trans-unit.source: A dashboard shows the trends of your application and the Active User Counts for the different versions of your application during a given time (hour/day/week/month/customized).
trans-unit.target: A dashboard shows the trends of your application and the Active User Counts for the different versions of your application during a given time (hour/day/week/month/customized).

trans-unit.source: The trends shown are based on the last 7 days.
trans-unit.target: The trends shown are based on the last 7 days.

trans-unit.source: See also
trans-unit.target: See also

trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting Guide - Analytics
trans-unit.target: Troubleshooting Guide - Analytics

trans-unit.source: Dashboard
trans-unit.target: Dashboard

trans-unit.source: You can add charts to an empty dashboard by choosing the "Send to dashboard" action from the gear menu of any chart in the Analytics section of the UI that you'd like to see on a dashboard.
trans-unit.target: You can add charts to an empty dashboard by choosing the "Send to dashboard" action from the gear menu of any chart in the Analytics section of the UI that you'd like to see on a dashboard.

trans-unit.source: + (Add a Dashboard)
trans-unit.target: + (Add a Dashboard)

trans-unit.source: You can use the "+" ribbon menu item to create a new dashboard that will show on the ribbon menu.
trans-unit.target: You can use the "+" ribbon menu item to create a new dashboard that will show on the ribbon menu.

trans-unit.source: Gear Menu
trans-unit.target: Gear Menu

trans-unit.source: You can use the gear menu of a dashboard to Delete, Rename, Share, or Schedule (E-mail Reception) of your dashboard.
trans-unit.target: You can use the gear menu of a dashboard to Delete, Rename, Share, or Schedule (E-mail Reception) of your dashboard.

trans-unit.source: You can use the Schedule option to define the schedule at which you would like to receive your custom dashboard by email.
trans-unit.target: You can use the Schedule option to define the schedule at which you would like to receive your custom dashboard by email.

trans-unit.source: You can schedule to receive it daily, weekly, or monthly.
trans-unit.target: You can schedule to receive it daily, weekly, or monthly.

trans-unit.source: You can choose the time of the day, and the day of the week, or day of the month when you would like to receive the e-mail.
trans-unit.target: You can choose the time of the day, and the day of the week, or day of the month when you would like to receive the e-mail.

trans-unit.source: Your e-mail address and time zone are based on the settings you have configured in the My Account section of the UI.
trans-unit.target: Your e-mail address and time zone are based on the settings you have configured in the My Account section of the UI.
